original_text:
Golden Hen
Non c’è niente di meglio, secondo noi, di una slot machine online che offre così tanti modi diversi di vincere ed è quello che si ottiene con l’ultima versione di NextGen Gaming – 243 modi di vincere in ogni singolo giro. La Golden Hen slot machine è piena di selvaggi, scatters, giri gratis e un jackpot non progressivo di 2.000 monete in palio.
Andate alla fattoria con questa video slot machine e sporcatevi le mani mentre cercate di scoprire le varie vittorie che si trovano sotto i rulli. La rotazione dei rulli può essere fatta a partire da 0,25 fino a un massimo di 250,00, quindi non importa quale sia il vostro budget, sarete in grado di godere di questo emozionante gioco di slot ricco di azione di NextGen Gaming.
Next Gen Gaming è noto per i suoi giochi di slot unici, e Golden Hen non fa eccezione a questa regola. Questo gioco presenta un’ambientazione da fattoria completa di un pollaio pieno di galline. Il gioco offre cinque rulli e fino a 243 possibilità di vincere ad ogni giro. È dotato di jolly e scatter card, e offre anche giri gratis su base regolare. Salta nella fattoria con Zio Tobia e fai fortuna trovando l’inafferrabile gallo d’oro.
Una grafica da amanti del mondo animale
Questo gioco dà un’aria di campagna, e lo stile si addice a questa idea. Lo sfondo del gioco è un campo di fattoria con una foresta in lontananza. Gli sfondi del mulinello sono di un blu vibrante, mentre le icone sopra di essi sono luminose e fumettistiche. Alcune delle icone raffigurano pulcini, uova con le zampe che spuntano fuori, polli cresciuti e il pollaio. Ci sono anche le tipiche icone del poker, come il re e la regina. Questi hanno dei chiodi che spuntano fuori e fanno sentire viva la fattoria di campagna.
Golden Hen è un tipico gioco di slot online con 5 rulli, ma ci sono 243 linee di pagamento in offerta. Le linee di pagamento sono fisse, il che significa che devi giocarle tutte ad ogni giro – ma questo significa ancora più possibilità di vincere. Il design del gioco è stato frutto di idee su idee, dato che si basa su una fattoria. Le bobine sono state recintate in un campo di mais che aspetta di essere raccolto, il cielo è blu e i campi sono verdi – un tipico scenario agricolo.
Tutti i simboli del gioco sono posizionati sui mulinelli blu reali e comprendono gallina d’oro, gallina standard, acchiappasogni piumato, gallina all’alba, fattoria, pollo, pulcino, uovo e valori delle carte di 9, 10, J, Q, Q, K e A.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Il simbolo selvatico in Golden Hen è il gallo, ma c’è un twist: questa icona apparirà solo sulla seconda, terza e quarta bobina della tavola. In un altro fattore unico, il gallo può sostituire ogni singola icona sulla tavola, che include il simbolo della dispersione! Questo è davvero poco comune e rende il potenziale di una grande rotazione e di un pagamento pesante una possibilità più grande.
Parlando del simbolo scatter, questa è un’altra caratteristica che spicca con la gallina d’oro. Sembra un cerchio con una piuma appesa sul lato. Inoltre arriva solo sulle tre bobine centrali. Una vincita allo scatter moltiplicherà le tue vincite per una quantità decente di monete. Se stai giocando un giro gratis, il selvaggio e lo scatter si combinano in un’unica icona. Appariranno ancora nei tre rulli centrali e sostituiranno ogni altro simbolo sul tabellone. Ottenere tre o più scatters o wilds vi darà dieci giochi gratis. Cinque di loro vincono in un gioco gratis e portano anche a un moltiplicatore 5x.
La slot machine Gallina d’Oro di NextGen Gaming può mancare di caratteristiche, specialmente se non ha un bonus round – ma la caratteristica delle rotazioni gratuite è ciò che fa davvero la differenza.
Innescando i giri gratis in questo gioco di slot a media varianza, avrete ancora più possibilità di vincere, grazie ai due set di wilds sui rulli e poi, se siete abbastanza fortunati da colpire un 5 di una linea di pagamento di tipo 5, sarà moltiplicato per cinque.
Il design del gioco di slot è quasi da cartone animato e assomiglia a un’animazione retrò della Warner Bros – ci aspettavamo per metà che il pollo saltasse fuori e corresse attraverso lo schermo. Quando le vittorie cadono, i simboli si animano e quasi saltano dai rulli. La Golden Hen slot machine ha una percentuale di ritorno al giocatore (RTP) del 97,22%.
La gallina standard è la selvaggia e appare solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4. Il wild ha il potere di trasformarsi in qualsiasi altro simbolo sui rulli (eccetto scatter) per aiutare ad aumentare il tuo bankroll completando le linee di paga vincenti.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Dolphin Reef è una slot piuttosto accattivante per gli appassionati del mare. La dolce grafica raffigura numerose creature marine, dai pesci pagliaccio alle tartarughe, ai cavallucci marini e alle stelle marine. Questi sono resi splendidamente, anche se c’è un sacco di spazio vuoto sullo schermo. Simboli semitrasparenti con uno sfondo oceanico adeguatamente epico alle spalle avrebbero creato un look più spettacolare.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Hen

Experience the thrill of 243 ways to win on every spin with the latest offering from NextGen Gaming - the Golden Hen slot machine. Packed with wilds, scatters, and free spins, plus a non-progressive jackpot of 2,000 coins up for grabs.

Get your hands dirty on the farm with this video slot and discover the various ways of winning hiding under the reels. With a minimum bet of 0.25 up to a maximum of 250.00, this exciting and action-packed NextGen Gaming slot provides non-stop entertainment for players of all budgets.

NextGen Gaming is renowned for its unique slot games, and Golden Hen is no exception. This game features a farm setting complete with a chicken coop full of chickens. With five reels and up to 243 ways to win on every spin, plus wild and scatter cards, regular free spins, and the chance to strike it rich finding the elusive golden rooster with Uncle Tobias.

A graphic design that animal lovers will adore.

The game creates a countryside feel that perfectly suits the farm theme. The background of the game is a farm field with a forest in the distance. The reels are vibrant blue while the icons above them are bright and cartoonish. Some of the symbols include chicks, eggs with legs popping out, grown chickens and the chicken coop. There are also typical poker icons like King and Queen that add to the country farm feel.

Golden Hen is a typical 5-reel online slot game with 243 paylines up for grabs. Paylines are fixed, which means that you have to play all of them on every spin, but this also means more opportunities to win. The game design is based on a farm, with the reels fenced in a waiting cornfield, the sky is blue and the fields are green - a typical agricultural scene.

All game symbols are positioned on the real blue and include the golden hen, standard hen, feathered dreamcatcher, dawn chicken, farm, chicken, chick, egg, and card values 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A.

Slot machine features and symbols.

The wild symbol in Golden Hen is the rooster, but there's a twist - this icon will only appear on the second, third, and fourth reels of the board. In another unique feature, the rooster can replace any single icon on the board, including the scatter symbol. This is a rarely seen characteristic and increases the potential for a big spin and a hefty payout.

Talking about the scatter symbol, this is another feature that stands out with the golden hen. It looks like a circle with a feather hanging on the side and only appears on the three central reels. A scatter win will multiply your winnings by a decent amount of coins. If you are playing a free spin, the wild and scatter combine into a single icon. They will still appear on the three central reels and replace every other symbol on the board. Get three or more scatters, and ten free games are yours. Five of them win in a free game and also result in a 5x multiplier.

NextGen Gaming's Golden Hen slot machine may lack features, particularly if there are no bonus rounds, but the free spins feature is what makes all the difference.

Triggering free spins in this medium variance slot game gives you even more chances to win, thanks to the two sets of wilds on the reels. Moreover, suppose you are fortunate enough to hit a 5 of a kind win in the five payline type. In that case, it will be multiplied by five.

The game design is almost cartoonish and looks like an old-fashioned Warner Bros animation - we expected the chicken to jump out and run through the screen. When you win, the symbols come to life and almost jump off the reels. The Golden Hen slot machine has a return-to-player (RTP) percentage of 97.22%.

The standard hen is the wild and only appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. The wild has the power to change into any other symbol on the reels (except scatter) to help boost your bankroll by completing winning paylines.

Similar Slot Machines.

Dolphin Reef is a rather eye-catching slot game for sea enthusiasts. The gorgeous graphics depict numerous sea creatures, from clownfish to turtles, seahorses, and starfish. These are beautifully rendered, although there is a lot of empty space on the screen. Semi-transparent symbols with a suitably epic ocean background behind them would have created a more spectacular look.

Golden Hen
This online slot machine from NextGen Gaming is the ultimate way to win big, offering 243 ways to win on every single spin. With wilds, scatters, free spins and a non-progressive jackpot of 2,000 coins up for grabs, you'll feel like you've stepped onto a farm when you play Golden Hen. Get your hands dirty as you explore the different ways to win under the reels. Spin the reels for as little as 0.25 up to a maximum of 250.00, ensuring that this action-packed slot game from NextGen Gaming is accessible to every budget.
As experienced gamblers know, Next Gen Gaming is known for its unique slot games, and Golden Hen is no exception. With a farmyard setting complete with a chicken coop full of hens, this game offers five reels and up to 243 ways to win on each spin. Featuring both wild and scatter symbols, this game also offers regular free spins. Join Uncle Tobias on the farm and strike it big by finding the elusive golden rooster.
The game has an animal lover feel to it, with the background of the game situated in a farm field with a forest in the distance. The reel backgrounds are a vibrant blue, while the icons above them are bright and comic-like. The symbols on the reels include chicks, eggs with legs poking out, grown chickens and the chicken coop. There are also typical poker icons like the king and queen, with nails sticking out and adding to the feel of the farm.
Golden Hen is a classic online slot game with five reels, but there are 243 paylines on offer. The paylines are fixed, meaning you must play all of them on each spin, but this also means you have even more chances to win. The game's design is inspired by a farm, with the reels being fenced in a cornfield waiting to be harvested, the sky is blue and the fields are green, giving it a typical rural setting.
All of the game's symbols are positioned on the real blue reels and include the golden hen, standard hen, feathered dreamcatcher, chicken at dawn, farm, chicken, chick, egg, and card values 9, 10, J, Q, K and A.
Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
The wild symbol in Golden Hen is the rooster, but there's a twist: this icon will only appear on the second, third and fourth reels of the board. In another unique feature, the rooster can substitute for any single icon on the board, which includes the scatter symbol! This is truly rare and increases the potential for a big spin and a heavy payout.
Speaking of the scatter symbol, this is another feature that stands out with the golden chicken. It looks like a circle with a feather hanging on the side, and arrives only on the three middle reels. Winning on the scatter will multiply your winnings by a decent amount of coins. If you're playing a free spin, both the wild and the scatter are combined into a single icon. They will still appear on the three middle reels and replace any other symbol on the board. Getting three or more scatters or wilds will give you ten free games. Five of them win in a free game and also lead to a 5x multiplier.
Although lacking in features such as a bonus round, the free spin feature is what sets this NextGen Gaming slot machine apart.
By triggering free spins in this medium-variance slot game, you'll have even more chances to win, thanks to the two sets of wilds on the reels. And if you're lucky enough to hit a 5 of a kind on a payline, it will be multiplied by five.
The game's slot machine design is almost cartoonish and resembles a retro animation from Warner Bros - we half expected the chicken to jump out and run across the screen. When the wins hit, the symbols animate and almost jump off the reels. The Golden Hen slot machine has a return to player (RTP) percentage of 97.22%.
The standard hen is the wild and only appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. The wild has the power to transform into any other symbol on the reels (except scatter) to help boost your bankroll by completing the winning paylines.
Similar Slot Machines
Dolphin Reef is a rather attractive slot for fans of the sea. The sweet graphics depict numerous sea creatures, from clownfish to turtles, seahorses, and starfish. These are beautifully rendered, although there's a lot of empty space on the screen. Semi-transparent symbols with an appropriately epic ocean background behind them would have created a more spectacular look.

Review: Golden Hen
This online slot machine from NextGen Gaming is the ultimate way to win big, offering 243 ways to win on every single spin. With wilds, scatters, free spins and a non-progressive jackpot of 2,000 coins up for grabs, you'll feel like you've stepped onto a farm when you play Golden Hen. Get your hands dirty as you explore the different ways to win under the reels. Spin the reels for as little as 0.25 up to a maximum of 250.00, ensuring that this action-packed slot game from NextGen Gaming is accessible to every budget.
As experienced gamblers know, Next Gen Gaming is known for its unique slot games, and Golden Hen is no exception. With a farmyard setting complete with a chicken coop full of hens, this game offers five reels and up to 243 ways to win on each spin. Featuring both wild and scatter symbols, this game also offers regular free spins. Join Uncle Tobias on the farm and strike it big by finding the elusive golden rooster.
The game has an animal lover feel to it, with the background of the game situated in a farm field with a forest in the distance. The reel backgrounds are a vibrant blue, while the icons above them are bright and comic-like. The symbols on the reels include chicks, eggs with legs poking out, grown chickens and the chicken coop. There are also typical poker icons like the king and queen, with nails sticking out and adding to the feel of the farm.
Golden Hen is a classic online slot game with five reels, but there are 243 paylines on offer. The paylines are fixed, meaning you must play all of them on each spin, but this also means you have even more chances to win. The game's design is inspired by a farm, with the reels being fenced in a cornfield waiting to be harvested, the sky is blue and the fields are green, giving it a typical rural setting.
All of the game's symbols are positioned on the real blue reels and include the golden hen, standard hen, feathered dreamcatcher, chicken at dawn, farm, chicken, chick, egg, and card values 9, 10, J, Q, K and A.
Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
The wild symbol in Golden Hen is the rooster, but there's a twist: this icon will only appear on the second, third and fourth reels of the board. In another unique feature, the rooster can substitute for any single icon on the board, which includes the scatter symbol! This is truly rare and increases the potential for a big spin and a heavy payout.
Speaking of the scatter symbol, this is another feature that stands out with the golden chicken. It looks like a circle with a feather hanging on the side, and arrives only on the three middle reels. Winning on the scatter will multiply your winnings by a decent amount of coins. If you're playing a free spin, both the wild and the scatter are combined into a single icon. They will still appear on the three middle reels and replace any other symbol on the board. Getting three or more scatters or wilds will give you ten free games. Five of them win in a free game and also lead to a 5x multiplier.
Although lacking in features such as a bonus round, the free spin feature is what sets this NextGen Gaming slot machine apart.
By triggering free spins in this medium-variance slot game, you'll have even more chances to win, thanks to the two sets of wilds on the reels. And if you're lucky enough to hit a 5 of a kind on a payline, it will be multiplied by five.
The game's slot machine design is almost cartoonish and resembles a retro animation from Warner Bros - we half expected the chicken to jump out and run across the screen. When the wins hit, the symbols animate and almost jump off the reels. The Golden Hen slot machine has a return to player (RTP) percentage of 97.22%.
The standard hen is the wild and only appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. The wild has the power to transform into any other symbol on the reels (except scatter) to help boost your bankroll by completing the winning paylines.
Similar Slot Machines
Dolphin Reef is a rather attractive slot for fans of the sea. The sweet graphics depict numerous sea creatures, from clownfish to turtles, seahorses, and starfish. These are beautifully rendered, although there's a lot of empty space on the screen. Semi-transparent symbols with an appropriately epic ocean background behind them would have created a more spectacular look.
